overview: After her stepmother India Summer finds a big parking ticket, Elena Koshka is punished and has two options, either forget about her trip to Europe or comply with her stepmother's request to eat her pussy. Christie Stevens is visiting her best friend, Ryan Keely. As they exchange pleasantries, Christie braces herself since she has something to say that she's been wanting to get off her chest awhile. Although it takes some effort, she finally manages to admit that she has a crush on Ryan's step-daughter, Athena Faris! Before they can carry on the conversation, Athena steps into the room, having overheard them. Mindi Mink tries on a tight dress and gets stuck in it. Her stepdaughter Serena Blair, who was walking past her bedroom started to laugh at the situation and took pictures. Angry about it, Mindi asks her stepdaughter to delete the photos immediately. Now that she's 18 and her stepmom is serious about removing them, Serena asks for something in return.
title: What's Mine Is Yours
